alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 15 at 6:13AM CST until December 15 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Roberts, Codington, Grant, Hamlin and Deuel Counties. In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As cold air pushes in, rain will change over to snow. The cold air will freeze the wet surfaces and could create icy conditions. Therefore, the combination of ice, snow, and wind could create difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
